mansfield.edu.bmiller.maze
Class AView

java.lang.Object
  mansfield.edu.bmiller.maze.AView

public class AView
extends java.lang.Object

MVC View: sets up a GUI view for the application. It creates a frame and main panel. On the main panel goes a drawingPanel that will hold the maze. In addition, a control panel is placed at the bottom of the main panel. License: CC BY-SA 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

Author:
John Phillips, Bryan Miller
